title: Calculating Grade Points
description: Create a function called calculateGradePoint that takes in a student's score as an argument and returns their corresponding grade point. The grade points are as follows: score 90-100 corresponds to 4.0, score 80-89 corresponds to 3.0, score 70-79 corresponds to 2.0, score 60-69 corresponds to 1.0, and score below 60 corresponds to 0.0.
